About.paragraph: At Laezr Consulting, we have our clients at heart and have made their satisfaction our utmost concern. It is imperative that online businesses have a secure, scalable environment in which to do business. This can be costly, and high costs can be a barrier to businesses that could benefit from our services. We want to help businesses grow with the changing landscape of technology. We plan to do this by utilizing time saving tools and frameworks to save time and money.

Services.name: Web Application Development
Services.text: Includes custom greenfield development, as well as developing new features in an existing codebase. It can range from a multi-featured website down to a single service.

Services.name: Web Application Maintenance
Services.text: Includes upgrading frameworks, optimizing legacy codebases, and adding monitoring.

Services.name: Server Deployment
Services.text: Includes managing and all the necessary infrastructure that is needed to deploy a server. For web based application, autoscaling groups will be deployed to meet demands when necessary and then scale down to save costs.

Services.name: Network Security & Design
Services.text: Includes the full design of networks on public clouds that utilize industry standard security practices.

Services.name: System & Application Monitoring
Services.text: Includes using products such as New Relic to aggregate logs to identify errors and performance issues immediately.

Services.name: Disaster Recovery & Backup
Services.text: Includes backing up databases and settings so in a worst case scenario, we can bring business functionality back online with minimal downtime.

Services.name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
Services.text: Includes scripts for repeatable, secure, push-button environments. This is useful for instantly standing up development, staging, and production environments with identical specs.

Services.name: Technical Consulting
Services.text: Includes advising clients on best practices, auditing infrastructure, and advocating for clients when interacting with third party service providers.

Services.name: Security Audits
Services.text: Includes review of infrastructure security rules and adherence to best practices. Findings are consolidated into an organized, prioritized report.

Services.name: Penetration Testing
Services.text: Includes using industry standard suites to test for vulnerabilities and patches that need to be applied. Results are returned in a prioritized report.
